pages.privacy: Privacy Policy | Lumière Hotel: Your Data, Our Commitment to Privacy Home Casino Reservation Home Casino Reservation Privacy Policy for Lumière Hotel Welcome to Lumière Hotel. Our commitment to your privacy is paramount. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning data handling, security measures, and your rights as our guest or website visitor, without focusing on personal information specifics. Data Security Practices We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your data. Our protocols include secure servers, encrypted communications, and restricted access to data. Third-Party Services We may engage third-party services for various functions, such as website management and guest services. These entities are selected with privacy and security in mind, adhering to our privacy standards. Anonymized Data Usage We may use anonymized data for statistical analysis, helping us understand trends and improve our services accordingly. This data cannot be linked back to any individual. Employee Training and Awareness Our employees receive regular training on privacy and data protection, ensuring they understand the importance and methods of protecting data. Compliance with Legal Obligations We comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding data protection and privacy. Our policies and practices are designed to ensure compliance with these legal obligations. Non-Discrimination Policy Our practices and services are guided by a strict non-discrimination policy, ensuring all guests and visitors are treated with respect and dignity, without any bias or prejudice. Environmental Sustainability Practices We are committed to environmental sustainability, incorporating eco-friendly practices in our operations and minimizing our ecological footprint. Community Engagement and Support Lumière Hotel actively engages with and supports our local community through various initiatives, reflecting our commitment to social responsibility. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed of how we are protecting your data. Contacting Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at lumiere@gmail.com. Lumière Stay connected with Lumière Hotel. Follow us on our social media platforms to keep up with the latest news, offers, and events. Find us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn. pages.terms: Terms & Conditions | Lumière Hotel: Ensuring a Luxury Experience for All Guests Home Casino Reservation Home Casino Reservation Terms & Conditions of Use Welcome to Lumière Hotel. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Lumière Hotel's Website, located at www.lumierehotel.com. Copyright Notice Copyright and other relevant intellectual property rights exist on all content on Lumière Hotel's website unless otherwise stated. Lumière Hotel reserves all rights. License to Use Website Unless otherwise stated, Lumière Hotel and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Lumière Hotel. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Lumière Hotel for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions. User Comments Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information. Lumière Hotel does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Lumière Hotel, its agents, or affiliates. Reservation Terms Reservations made at Lumière Hotel are subject to acceptance and availability. Lumière Hotel reserves the right to refuse any reservation at its discretion. Cancellation Policy Cancellation policies may vary depending on the rate or dates of your reservation. Please refer to your reservation confirmation to verify your cancellation policy. Limitation of Liability In no event shall Lumière Hotel, nor any of its officers, directors, and employees, be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this website. Indemnification You hereby indemnify to the fullest extent Lumière Hotel from and against any and/or all liabilities, costs, demands, causes of action, damages and expenses arising in any way related to your breach of any of the provisions of these terms. Severability If any provision of these terms is found to be invalid under any applicable law, such provisions shall be deleted without affecting the remaining provisions herein. Variation of Terms Lumière Hotel is permitted to revise these terms at any time as it sees fit, and by using this website you are expected to review such terms on a regular basis to ensure you understand all terms and conditions governing use of this website. Contact Us Should you have any questions or wish to receive further information regarding our terms and conditions, please do not hesitate to contact us at lumiere@gmail.com. Casino Terms of Use The Lumière Hotel Casino is committed to providing a responsible gaming environment for all guests and patrons. By participating in any casino games or betting activities, you agree to comply with all applicable laws, our policies, and the responsible gaming practices we endorse. Age Restriction Guests must be 18 years of age or older to participate in casino gaming activities at Lumière Hotel. Valid identification may be requested by casino staff to verify age compliance. Responsible Gaming Lumière Hotel encourages responsible gaming and provides resources and support for those who seek assistance with gambling-related problems. Information on responsible gaming is available at the casino's customer service desk and on our website. Game Fairness and Integrity All casino games at Lumière Hotel are operated under strict guidelines to ensure fairness and integrity. Our games are regularly audited, and we maintain transparency in our gaming operations to uphold the trust of our patrons. Betting Limits Betting limits may vary by game and table. Lumière Hotel reserves the right to set and adjust betting limits as necessary to ensure a fair and enjoyable gaming experience for all guests. Privacy of Information Lumière Hotel is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all guests participating in gaming activities. Personal information collected through gaming operations is handled in accordance with our privacy policy, ensuring confidentiality and integrity. Dispute Resolution In the event of a dispute arising from casino gaming activities, Lumière Hotel has procedures in place for a fair and timely resolution. Guests are encouraged to bring any concerns to the attention of casino management for immediate assistance. Amendment to Casino Terms Lumière Hotel reserves the right to amend these casino terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the casino section of our website. Guests are responsible for reviewing these terms regularly to stay informed of their rights and obligations.
